author: mharwood
msg: Added QueryTemplateManager.java to aid construction of XML queries from form input by using XSL templates. A Junit test provides examples of use. This approach offers a convenient way of externalizing and changing how user input is turned into Lucene queries. Database applications often adopt similar practices by externalizing SQL in template files that can be easily changed/optimized by a DBA.

author: dos
msg: bug 5305: add msa_networks to the list of config items with their own clone method

author: dblevins
msg: Moved the openejb-jar v3 descriptors into this module.  Renamed the v2 package to match.
Added unmarshallers for the various objects.
